meanings.definition: A group of alkaloids found in plants of the nightshade family, used medicinally for their anticholinergic effects.
meanings.sent1: The hyoscyamines in the plant help in treating certain medical conditions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed hyoscyamines to help with stomach problems.
meanings.sent3: The hyoscyamines in the medicine made the patient's eyes go wide with surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had the hyoscyamines effect, making everyone around her feel lighter.
meanings.sent5: The hyoscyamines worked like magic, calming the nerves of the anxious patient.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacist stocked up on hyoscyamines for the upcoming flu season.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the effects of hyoscyamines on different patient groups.
meanings.sent3: The hyoscyamines in the lab were mislabeled, causing a funny mix-up.
